item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description: Baoqiang Zhan School of Economics and Management, Harbin Institute of Technology Email: 21b910010@stu.hit.edu.cn Competences & Languages Research Interests FinTech, Marketing-finance Interface, Causal Inference Research Methods Econometrics, Machine Learning, Deep Learning Skills Data crawling, Big data analysis, Natural Language Processing Programming Python, Stata, MatLab, R, SPSS Language IELTS: 6.5 (Good) Educational Background Sept. 2021 ~ Present, Ph.D. Candidate (Supervisor: Prof. Yongli Li) School of Economics and Management, Harbin Institute of Technology
